app.objects package¶

Submodules¶

app.objects.cols module¶

class app.objects.cols.Cols(names)[source]¶

Bases: app.utilities.misc.obj

– Columns Holds of summaries of columns. – Columns are created once, then may appear in multiple slots.

app.objects.data module¶

class app.objects.data.Data(src)[source]¶

Bases: app.utilities.misc.obj

Data is a holder of ‘rows’ and their summaries (in ‘cols’)

add(data)[source]¶

Add a row to data. Calls add() to update the cols with new values. :param data: a single Row entry :return: None

stats(places, showCols, func)[source]¶

app.objects.num module¶

class app.objects.num.Num(c: int = 0, s: str = '')[source]¶

Bases: app.utilities.misc.obj

add(v)[source]¶

Reservoir sampler. Keep at most the.nums numbers (and if we run out of room, delete something old, at random)., :param v: :return:

div()[source]¶

Diversity (standard deviation for Nums, entropy for Syms) :return:

mid()[source]¶

Central tendency (median for Nums, mode for Syms) :return:

nums()[source]¶

Return kept numbers, sorted.
